description: Complete Flask application endpoint documentation embedded in HTML comments on all pages. Documents all 6 endpoints with descriptions, HTTP methods, and accepted parameters. This is a critical information disclosure vulnerability.
notes: CRITICAL INFORMATION DISCLOSURE: Every page on the application contains complete API documentation in HTML comments. This includes endpoint names, HTTP methods, accepted parameters, and descriptions. This is a major reconnaissance aid for attackers and violates security best practices of not exposing application internals in client-facing code. Developers appear to have included this documentation for convenience but it is accessible to any user viewing page source.",
